data.name: Ancient Wars: Sparta Definitive Edition
data.detailed_description:
Definitive Edition of Ancient Wars: Sparta using a new improved version of the powerful AWE engine, the best of Ancient Wars: Sparta mechanics and adding a huge list of improvements, new mechanics to create what the RTS fans have been looking for years, getting a game that offers hundred of differents strategics tactics, total player freedom to customize the troops of their civilizations, a huge unit and skill tree, with RPG elements and historically epic moments singleplayer campaigns.

All these features will be enhanced by a great multiplayer experience with various game modes as well as a large collection of maps inspired by historical locations to choose for your battles and special maps for competitive multiplayer.

The Game

The game will feature:

  • Seven playable factions with more than 100 different unit types, 28 heroes, and 90 different weapons and shields.
  • Extended unit customization and reequip system
  • Improved Graphics and Textures
  • Totally new and innovative gameplay, never seen before in an RTS
  • Three single-player campaigns based on events in Ancient History (with 21 missions in total)
  • Single-player & Co-op & Multi-player Great Historical Battles
  • Single-player & Co-op & Multi-player challenge maps
  • Five different game modes (classic skirmish, conquest, domination, survival, and MOBA)
  • New and Competitive Multiplayer
  • Free Updates and DLC
  • Big map collection inspired by ancient world locations
  • Reactive AI whose response depends on your actions as a human player
  • Realistic physics system never seen before in an RTS
  • Weather that affects gameplay
  • Near 200 special abilities for your heroes, special units, wonders, etc
  • Wonders of the ancient world for each civilization
  • Realistic Naval Combat
  • Campaigns and Maps Editor
  • Epic soundtrack inspired by popular film scores.
  • Localization in mutiple languages
  • Militia, Mercenaries, Spies, Uniques Buildings, etc...
  • 4k/8k and 144FPS support

data.short_description: One of the most innovative Real-Time Strategy Games comes back totally renewed and improved to the smallest detail, with epic large scale battles, new civilizations, unit customization system never seen before in a game, 8K support, and much more.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Hungarian, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD FX 4300
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 430 or AMD HD 6570 with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 720p/30 fps at low settings, 4GB Ram recommended for multiplayer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or AMD RX 460 with at least 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p/60 fps
